short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically generate web-ready or reddit-ready ReddBeds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ReddBed takes the wonderful world of reddit commentary and brings it to the masses. The ReddBed extension allows you to select comments on a reddit page and generate a web-ready tree hierarchy of updating reddit comments with live timestamps, comment scores, and text. The ReddBed extension can also generate Markdown syntax, meaning you can select comments on a post that you find interesting and generate a tree hierarchy that will display the thread naturally in a reddit comment.

Learn more at http://jhaenchen.github.io/ReddBed
